<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Neothelid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=739)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This gigantic, mauve worm has a hooked mouth with multiple circular bands of teeth and four barbed tongues. A wielder of terrible occult powers and a vast alien intellect, the neothelid serves the ageless horrors that dwell in strange dimensions beyond known reality—the Outer Gods and Great Old Ones of the Elder Mythos. Neothelids pass down these mysteries to the eerie wormlike creatures they spawn and create in preparation for a future where the worms below shall rule—a time when all other life is nothing more than food.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Neothelid.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Neothelid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=739)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 181 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +29; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), thoughtsense 100 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Alghollthu](/Languages.aspx?ID=24), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11); [telepathy 100 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +25, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +29, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +29, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +29

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +4

**Con** +6

**Int** +8

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +8
</row>

**Thoughtsense** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The neothelid uses its mind as a precise sense at the listed range to notice all non-[mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) creatures.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 37 

**Fort** +27 

**Ref** +23 

**Will** +29 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 345

**Immunities**
acid

**Resistances**
mental 15

**Weaknesses**
cold iron 15

**Dimensional Wormhole** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) **Trigger** A creature the neothelid is aware of uses a [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effect; **Effect** The neothelid creates an extradimensional wormhole at the triggering creature's initial location that persists for up to 1 minute. If the neothelid moves into the wormhole's space, the neothelid teleports to the same destination as the triggering creature.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +28 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+13 piercing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rasping tongue +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+13 slashing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 38, attack +30
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **5th**
[Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193) (at will), [Telekinetic Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=332) (at will)
- **6th**
[Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=268) (×3), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (at will)
- **7th**
[Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218), [Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338)
- **8th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315), [Summon Entity](/Spells.aspx?ID=321)

**Rituals** DC 38

- **2nd**
[Inveigle](/Rituals.aspx?ID=14)
- **3rd**
[Geas](/Rituals.aspx?ID=12)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The neothelid breathes a spray of acid that deals 16d6 acid damage in a 60-foot cone (DC 38 basic Reflex save). The neothelid can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

**Instant Suggestion** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Trigger** A creature fails a Will save against a spell or effect created by the neothelid; **Effect** The neothelid casts a [_suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) spell it has available on the creature that failed its Will save.

**Lashing Tongues** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The neothelid's four tongues lash out in a frenzy at several targets. It makes up to four rasping tongue Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the neothelid's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the neothelid makes all of its attacks.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" />  Large, 2d12 bludgeoning plus 2d12 acid, Rupture 27

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_3_Locations.png">Denebrum</title>

Most neothelids on Golarion reside in the Vault of Derebrum, deep within the Darklands. Here, in a vast cavern of fetid pools of stinking swamps and surreal forests of poisonous fungi, neothelid hives nestle among twisted spires of hardened resin that look as horrific as the monstrous worms themselves. Tended by armies of worm-like minions who worship them as gods, they endlessly plot, scheme, and wage war.
</aside>
